name: Ran out of time
description:
Make your way to the top of the clock tower

Pick up cogs along the way so you can repair the clock

Controls:

A/D and space for left/right jump

How to download:

Download .ZIP, extract and run .exe. Any issues please comment

Created for MiniJam 112:Chrono

Made by:

Paul Erwich, Scott Knapp, Sid Bevins
